scripts.start: npm run replica && npm run serve
scripts.replica: dfx stop && dfx start --clean --background && npm run create-canisters && npm run deploy && npm run mint
scripts.create-canisters: npm run create:main && npm run create:ledger && npm run create:seed && npm run create:btcflower && npm run create:ethflower && npm run create:icpflower
scripts.deploy: npm run build-power-equalizer && npm run deploy:main && npm run deploy:ledger && npm run deploy:seed && npm run deploy:btcflower && npm run deploy:ethflower && npm run deploy:icpflower
scripts.deploy:ledger: . ./set-deploy-env.zsh && dfx deploy ledger --no-wallet --mode reinstall -y --argument '(record {minting_account = "'$(dfx ledger account-id)'"; initial_values = vec { record { "'$WALLET_ADDRESS'"; record { e8s=100_000_000_000 } }; }; send_whitelist = vec {}})'
scripts.deploy:btcflower: dfx deploy btcflower --argument "$(cat btcflower-initArgs.did)" --mode reinstall --yes && dfx canister call btcflower initMint && dfx canister call btcflower shuffleTokensForSale && dfx canister call btcflower airdropTokens && dfx canister call btcflower enableSale
scripts.deploy:ethflower: dfx deploy ethflower --argument "$(cat ethflower-initArgs.did)" --mode reinstall --yes && dfx canister call ethflower initMint && dfx canister call ethflower shuffleTokensForSale && dfx canister call ethflower airdropTokens && dfx canister call ethflower enableSale
scripts.deploy:icpflower: dfx deploy icpflower --argument "$(cat icpflower-initArgs.did)" --mode reinstall --yes && dfx canister call icpflower initMint && dfx canister call icpflower shuffleTokensForSale && dfx canister call icpflower airdropTokens && dfx canister call icpflower enableSale
